Refactor: Break ZoneManager into modular files + Add monitor change detection

Major Changes:
- Split 1666-line ZoneManager.cs into 9 focused files
- Added MonitorManager with change detection via fingerprinting
- Added monitor mismatch warnings on startup
- Config now stores monitor fingerprint for validation

New File Structure:
- NativeApi.cs - Windows API declarations
- ZoneConfiguration.cs - Config models and persistence
- MonitorManager.cs - Monitor detection and validation
- ZoneOverlay.cs - Read-only zone display
- EditableZoneOverlay.cs - Interactive zone editing
- DragZoneOverlay.cs - Drag-and-drop highlighting
- GlobalMouseHook.cs - Mouse event hook
- GlobalKeyboardHook.cs - Keyboard hotkey hook
- ZoneManager.cs - Simplified main form (now ~800 lines)

Fixes:
- Zones for missing monitors are now detected and skipped
- User prompted to reset zones when monitors change
- Better error messages for monitor configuration issues

This fixes the issue where zones stopped working after monitor setup changed.
